title: 2 Bedroom 1st floor in Eastern Lakewood
posting_body: ['Small, 2 bedroom, 1 bath in the trendy east Madison area of Lakewood.', 'Full bath has one piece shower/tub, white vanity and mirrored cabinet.', "Eat in kitchen is 10' x 12' and is updated with new satin white shaker style cabinets and black countertops.", 'A new self cleaning, solid glasstop range(not shown in pictures), newer 18 cu.', 'ft. fridge and white remote control ceiling fan with LED lighting completes the kitchen.', "The first bedroom is 10' x 13', the 2nd bedroom is 10' x 11'.", 'both bedrooms have nice sized closets and brushed nickel remote controlled ceiling fans with dimmable LED lighting.', "The living room is 10' x 13' and includes a brushed nickel remote controlled ceiling fan with dimmable LED lighting.", 'Washer and dryer hookups are provided in the basement.', 'There is a small screened porch off the kitchen.', 'The unit has newer vinyl windows with mimi-blinds, and a newer furnace with programmable thermostat, The house has a new steel roof with added insulation.', 'Walking distance to RTA trains and bus routes on Madison Ave.', 'Also l/2 block from a dollar store, LBM restaurant/bar, and Griffen Cider House.', 'Available September 1st.', 'No application fee.', 'Open house on Sunday from noon until 3 PM.', '1595', 'Ridgewood.']
